/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding to the city's vibrant atmosphere. The sun shines brightly in the sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
